Package org.jfree.chart.event

Class ChartChangeEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.EventObject
      • org.jfree.chart.event.ChartChangeEvent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AxisChangeEvent, LegendChangeEvent, PlotChangeEvent, RendererChangeEvent, TitleChangeEvent

    public class ChartChangeEvent
extends java.util.EventObject
    A change event that encapsulates information about a change to a chart.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int GENERAL
      Event type indicating a general change to a chart (typically just requires a redraw).
      static int NEW_DATASET
      Event type indicating that the chart has a new dataset.
      static int UPDATED_DATASET
      Event type indicating that the chart's data source has been modified.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ChartChangeEvent​(java.lang.Object source)
      Creates a new chart change event.

      Creates a new chart change event.
      ChartChangeEvent​(java.lang.Object source, JFreeChart chart, int type)
      Creates a new chart change event.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Returns the chart that generated the change event.

      Returns the event type.
